com.google.ase.language
Class Language

java.lang.Object
  com.google.ase.language.Language
Direct Known Subclasses:
BeanShellLanguage, JavaScriptLanguage, LuaLanguage, PerlLanguage, PythonLanguage, RubyLanguage, ShellLanguage, TclLanguage
public abstract class Language
extends java.lang.Object

Represents the programming language supported by the ASE.

Author:
igor.v.karp@gmail.com (Igor Karp)
